issue.title: Thread pitch definition is unclear (convert gazebo from rad/m to m/revolution)

content.raw: I added [documentation in ScrewJoint.hh](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/557dd995c94305a506cbab7207fe72bbf3bacb97/gazebo/physics/ScrewJoint.hh?at=simbody#cl-74), for now I am keeping it consistent with previous implementation (angular motion per linear motion or rad/m), so not to break existing models in sdf/urdf. But I agree we should make the switch to the official wikipedia definition.
content.html: I added documentation in ScrewJoint.hh, for now I am keeping it consistent with previous implementation (angular motion per linear motion or rad/m), so not to break existing models in sdf/urdf. But I agree we should make the switch to the official wikipedia definition.
